author: marrs
msg: Initial conversion of the bundle repository analysis.

author: jacopoc
msg: First pass in fixing the buggy code for captcha support; this is a first pass (the next one will probably be to save the image in the session rather than in the file system); the main problems fixed are related to concurrent access: the class was not thread safe and this, especially in servers with high traffic, could cause a series of issues like:
* captcha images created and then lost
* captcha images created in the wrong location (for example out of the OFBiz folder)
* the folder runtime/tempfiles/captcha could be locked
